options: ['He likes basketball and English.', 'He likes baseball and English.', 'He likes basketball and Chinese.', 'He likes baseball and Chinese.']
article: Hello, I'm Allan Peterson. I'm an English boy. But I am in China. I have a good friend. Let me tell you something about him. His name is Li Ming. He is a student. He is in class Two, Grade One, No.5 middle school. We are classmates. Li Ming is 14 years old. He likes basketball and English. We often play basketball after school.
